Appearance

Marty Weel for United States Chief Technology Officer

Call to Action: Home Land Security

About Marty

Audio Stream

Impact Report and Priorities

If I were to continue with this project, these are the priorities and impact on the government and the private market.

Use Cases

Various use cases for jurisdictions that use this technology.

Social Security Personal Profile

The social security number has been used as an identity in the marketplace for decades. We will extend this by developing a personal server for users that uses the social security number to share and receive information in the marketplace with a personal URL and server.

United States Internet

Making the internet safe and prosperous for United States citizens by providing a private domain system, including licensing capabilities, revocation capabilities, government ID verification, content filtering, and security using Artificial Intelligence.

Real-time Electronic Check System

A real-time e-check system will allow United States citizens to transfer money electronically in real-time at no cost to each other. A jury system will allow judgment against buyers and sellers, where domains can be fined and/or revoked for fraud or also users could be banned from owning domains.

Consumer Protection Agency

A place for consumers to voice their opinions about issues that concern them at the federal, state, and city levels with government traceability to completion. A "consumer" lobby of sorts. This will start with local government so people can voice their opinion about city issues where it will be logged and can be moved to grant status to resolve.

Children Electronic Device Protection Agency

A simple multi-platform approach allowing parents to monitor and control their children's electronic devices across all devices with a single interface.

E-Census

A complete revamp of the census for the United States Internet, allowing various government agencies to survey constituents and provide resulting datasets to the public for analysis.

Copyright System

A complete revamp of the copyright system, enabling the public to submit works electronically, verify, and protect copyrighted work using Artificial Intelligence.

FEMA Response System

A set of network and software services deployed in disaster areas during emergencies, connecting, tracking, and executing emergency responses.

StarLink Satellite Network

Collaborate with the United Nations and the USA to make the StarLink Satellite system an FCC asset, and asset respectively for other countries. A software system would allow the market place to sell Wi-Fi devices under their own businesses on a unified sales platform. A private company controlling communication system outside of the FCC is a risk for the United States of United States.

Artificial Intelligence Protection Agency

Tools and technologies to evaluate AI models and understand the political intents behind foreign actor AI models. For example, a debate between Anthropic (USA) and Qwen (Chinese) on whether Taiwan is a Chinese territory or an independent country could provide deep insights into AI training models. This product is already completed.

Grant System

The current grant system provides funding exclusively at the federal level. The proposed system would empower state and local municipalities to identify specific needs and offer a streamlined way to provide funding and accountability for grants.

United States Internet Public Service Announcements

A public service announcement service available to all media platforms to serve public messages from various government agencies. For example, the federal government might use it to educate parents on device time for their kids, while a local municipality might discuss bike lane etiquette.

warrant.gov

Allows the rapid issuing of warrants at city, state, and federal levels with government oversight to make the process of viewing peoples devices inline with the constitution.

Safe Passage

A technology platform for at-risk homeless individuals and families from any situation to find safe housing regardless of their circumstances.

National Highway Traffic Safety Administration (NHTSA)

Allows car buyers to install their own operating systems in vehicles, providing a single, user-friendly interface while driving. Operating systems would be transferable from car to car if applicable.

Television Technology Act

Enforcement of a single operating system on TVs that can be installed by the customer. This resolves conflicts between Apple, Google, Amazon, and TV manufacturers over control of TV interfaces.

FBI Counterfeit Tracking System

A system allowing the public to return counterfeit money to banks for legitimate currency, tracking areas of counterfeit circulation.

Dynamic Rate System

Update the banking system to allow rates for loans to be managed based on local market factors instead of a single national rate. A data warehouse would provide insights into market conditions.

Emergency Communication System

A direct channel for emergency communications from government to the public, including messages and location-aware information based on mobile phone or address data.

Small Business Administration

Rebuilding the Small Business Administration to provide loans to its citizens to fund businesses that are part of the micro-industrial revolution and the breaking up of multi-national corporate supply chains.

Voting ID

Provide a voting capability for various areas of government by issuing IDs during the voting process, with an open database to verify results.

CDC

The Center for Disease Control will provide real-time test results from testing facilities. Unknown diseases will have containment plans for jurisdictions, with notifications via the [emergency notification system](/ecs-gov/) to stay indoors.

Department of Education

The department of education will be the management system for all schools who receive grant money.

Human and Health Services

Child Care,

Trade School Data Services

Provide market data on jobs, and develop schools to fill the need.

FBI

Integration of operating systems into the FBI.

News Media

A value chain of news media business will work together to provide media sites. This include media content sites, articles writers, and ad businesses.
